summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Evanson Avenue, from a point approximately 180 feet south of the south margin of North 40th Street to North 50th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7631 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
